result:
Done. Here's what was changed:

**File:** `src/components/portal/Footer.tsx`

**Change:** Added `pb-8` (32px) to the footer wrapper div.

```diff
- <div className="mt-14 pt-6 border-t border-se-card flex items-center justify-center gap-2.5">
+ <div className="mt-14 pt-6 pb-8 border-t border-se-card flex items-center justify-center gap-2.5">
```

`pb-8` sits in the middle of the requested `pb-6`â€“`pb-10` range and pairs well with the existing `pt-6` top padding already on the element. Since this is the shared `Footer` component used across all pages, the change applies globally.
